name: Beyond the Stage at Livermore Valley Arts

episodes.title: The Psychology of Cults: Live At The Bankhead
episodes.description:
In this clip, cult intervention specialist Ashlen Hilliard dives into the fascinating and chilling world of cult psychology — exploring how people get drawn in, what keeps them there, and how they can break free.

Catch the full conversation on our Beyond the Stage podcast, then experience Ashlen live in person at her upcoming event:

🧠 Psychology of Cults – Live at the Bankhead Theater
🗓 Sunday, November 23, 2025
⏰ 3:00 PM
🎟 Learn more & get tickets: https://livermorearts.org/events/psychology-of-cults/

Listen & Watch the full podcast episode here or wherever you get your podcasts: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lxqbeUnKDh4

#BeyondTheStagePodcast #PsychologyOfCults #LivermoreArts #BankheadTheater #AshlenHilliard

episodes.title: Beyond The Stage: Ashlen Hilliard
episodes.description: Step into the mind of Ashlen Hilliard, renowned Cult Intervention Specialist, Founder of People Leave Cults, with a Master’s degree in Psychology of Coercive Control. In this episode, we discuss why people join cults and what it takes to break away from them. Ashlen unpacks the psychology, manipulation tactics, and hidden dangers that cults use to control their members. Come hear Ashlen Hilliard at Psychology of Cults on November 23rd at the Bankhead Theater for a gripping, eye-opening, and thought provoking event. 🎟️ Get your tickets now at LivermoreArts.org
